about_the_game:
"As a solo developer, I’ve poured my heart into every detail of Short Snow, striving to create an immersive and challenging experience. From the howling winds to the crunch of snow underfoot, every element has been crafted with care and dedication to bring this frozen wilderness to life."

Immerse yourself in the true survival experience with our detailed cooking mechanics. After hunting and harvesting fresh meat, carefully prepare your meal over an open campfire. Watch the meat transform as it cooks, sizzling and browning to perfection. The realistic cooking process ensures you maintain optimal health and energy levels, essential for enduring the harsh, cold environment.

In Short Snow, a realistic open-world survival experience, you find yourself lost in a vast, snow-covered forest after a harrowing plane crash. With temperatures plummeting and hunger gnawing, you must craft your way to survival.

Key features:

  • Authentic Winter Survival: Manage hunger, thirst, and hypothermia as you navigate the unforgiving wilderness.

  • Craft Your Escape: Gather resources, build shelters, and craft tools to fight for survival.

  • Face the Wild: Encounter dangerous predators and learn to outsmart or outfight them.

  • Unravel the Mystery: Explore the wreckage and uncover the secrets behind the crash.

  • Will you succumb to the elements, or will you conquer the frozen wilderness? The choice is yours.

It is up to you how you want to play. Choose your adventure with two distinct game modes

Story Mode:Discover who you are and learn about the past as you fight to survive. Find your friends and make your way back home while facing various challenges along the way.

Endless Mode: Dive into a sandbox of limitless possibilities. With abundant resources and an expanded array of crafting options at your disposal, you are free to shape your own destiny. Build, explore, and conquer the world around you on your terms. Whether you seek to create a thriving settlement or challenge the wild in solitary resilience, your journey is yours to define. Adventure awaits at every turn in this open-ended survival experience.

Brave the harsh wilderness and explore the vast, snowy forest. Discover hidden secrets, gather essential resources, and uncover the mysteries of the frozen landscape. Every step in the snow, every rustle in the trees, brings you closer to mastering the unforgiving environment.

content_descriptors.notes: Short Snow may contain content that is not suitable for all ages. Features scenes of hunting wildlife and visual depictions of blood and injuries.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750ti 4GB / AMD Radeon R7 360
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
